group_1.textLeft: (Relationships are so hard because there's@so, so many things to worry about.)
(I should just run away and@give a chocolate to Mii,)
(eat the rest myself. That's the easiest@way to not leave any traces...)
(I don't live like that anymore,)
(I swore not to...)

group_1.narration: When I went to school,@I felt like forming relationships@was annoying and stupid.
I didn't even try to get along@with anyone in class.
As a result, no one bullied me,@so I didn't have to worry about anyone@or the stress that comes with it...
But I was not "important"@to anyone in the class.
When that man barricaded himself in@and held our class hostage,
everyone chose me as a sacrifice.
This was because I never made friends@with anyone. It was my fault...
Because I didn't have a good character,@I was irritated by everyone@and lost my cool.
I, by sheer chance of Kyubey appearing@in front of me, had my wish granted.
[textBlack:This is what you call spite, isn't it?]
[textBlack:The results of that spiteful wish]@[textBlack:were hundreds of times more tragic]@[textBlack:than if I had just been sacrificed.]

[textBlack:What's worse, all the people around me]@[textBlack:didn't know about wishes and magic,]@[textBlack:and they saw me as a lucky survivor― a victim.]@[textBlack:They comforted me and treated me with kindness...]
If I had built relationships properly,@I know I wouldn't have been@chosen as a sacrifice.
If I wasn't chosen as a sacrifice,@such a wish wouldn't have happened,@and my entire class wouldn't have died.
If a more proper wish were made instead,@there would have been@a good ending for everyone.

group_1.textLeft: (That's why I am the way I am@at this point,)
(troubled by relationships with people.)
(Not giving out chocolates is@absolutely unforgivable...)

group_1.textRight: I don't want anyone getting@into a fight or being sad...

group_1.textLeft: Fumuu...
Excuse me for listening in on@your conversation,
but you two are taking this way too seriously.@You should be more carefree.

group_1.textRight: We're not irresponsible people@like you, Big Sis!

group_1.textLeft: Hmm. And here I had a nice suggestion.
If you don't want to rank all of your@beloved Magical Girls,
you can leave them in a place@that they frequent.
You won't hand them out,
and can write a simple@"feel free to take one".

group_1.textRight: ...Ah, I get it! That way the early bird@gets the worm!

group_1.textLeft: Right― no trouble afterwards. And yet your@thoughts will still be known to everyone.

group_1.textRight: Then we'll separate some for our loved ones,@some for the Tomorrow Shop,
and leave the rest with Big Sis at@her Coordinator's Shop.

group_1.textLeft: Fumumuu!
Sudachi...
I don't know what exactly happened@to you...
But I had a difficult school life@as well.
At times I tended to have@extreme thoughts.
But you know, reality is that sometimes@it's better to just go with the flow.
Not every person in the world@is bad,
and more than anything,@it gets exhausting.

group_1.textRight: (I kept trying to be alone.@I was trying to reflect on it, but...)

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, you're welcome.

group_1.textCenter: I am terribly sorry, you two.
What I told you caused@so much confusion...

group_1.textRight: That's not true, Rabitan!@If you hadn't told us,
I wouldn't have thought about giving to@Nayutan or Grandma and Grandpa!

group_1.textCenter: To hear you say that is wonderful.
Well, now it's time for the decoration stage...
But do you have anything to add?

group_1.textRight: [chara:103801:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Darn it, we have chocolate,@but nothing to decorate with!

group_1.textLeft: Fumumufun!
Then I'll give you what I'm using.

group_1.textRight: That's right, Big Sis's making@chocolates too.

group_1.textLeft: There's some tempera made with@eggs and oil.

group_1.textRight: The heck is that? Sounds good!

group_1.textCenter: Ah― please don't. That is a type of paint.

group_1.textRight: M-Mii...isn't really in the mood@for paint this year~

group_1.textLeft: Really? Then what else...

group_1.textCenter: You don't happen to have something@like colorful sugar, do you?

group_1.textLeft: If that's what you want, I have some left over@that I bought for our New Year's mochi soup.

group_1.textCenter: For mochi soup...? Why...?@B-but that is usable.
Now if you have dried fruit or such,@that would be nice to add some sourness...

group_1.textLeft: I just happen to have some I bought to go with@the dried anchovies for our new year's feast.

group_1.textCenter: For dried anchovies...? Why...?@W-well that's fine...

group_1.textRight: By some miracle this is gonna@work out!

group_1.textLeft: Fumu―!
Fumu?
